title: Sri Lanka Core Inflation Rate
description: Core consumer prices in Sri Lanka increased 49.70 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Core Inflation Rate in Sri Lanka averaged 7.39 percent from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 50.20 percent in September of 2022 and a record low of 2.13 percent in December of 2013. This page provides the latest reported value for - Sri Lanka Core Inflation Rate - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Central Bank of Sri Lanka
